item.title: CVE-2024-37457|2024-08-02T03:57:39.530Z -- ultimate%20blocks -- ultimate%20blocks%20%E2%80%93%20gutenberg%20blocks%20plugin
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Ultimate Blocks Ultimate Blocks – Gutenberg Blocks Plugin allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Ultimate Blocks – Gutenberg Blocks Plugin: from n/a through 3.1.9.
